sqlMap.update: UPDATE eka.mst_message_daily SET msmd_active = 0 WHERE msmd_id = TO_DATE(#value#, 'dd/mm/yyyy')
update eka.lst_user set lus_email = #email# where lus_id = #lus_id#

UPDATE EKA.LST_REFF_BII SET LCB_NO = #ls_cab# ,NAMA_REFF = #nm_agent# ,FLAG_LISENSI = #ref# ,FLAG_AKTIF = #flag# ,TGL_NON_AKTIF = #tglNonAktif# ,TGL_AKTIF = #tglAktif# ,LRBJ_ID=(select lrbj_id from eka.lst_reff_bii_jab where n_id_bsim=#pos_code#) ,TGL_UPDATE = #tglUpdate# ,NIK = trim(#nik#) ,PRE_NIK = trim(#tnik#) WHERE (trim(AGENT_CODE) =trim(#kd_agent#) ) AND JENIS=#jenis# AND LRB_ID = (select max(lrb_id) from eka.lst_reff_bii z where (trim(z.AGENT_CODE) = trim(#kd_agent#) ) and z.flag_aktif=1 AND z.jenis=#jenis# )

UPDATE EKA.LST_CABANG_BII SET NAMA_CABANG = #nm_cabang# WHERE ( EKA.LST_CABANG_BII.KODE = #kd_cabang# ) AND ( EKA.LST_CABANG_BII.NAMA_CABANG NOT LIKE '%(NA)%') AND ( EKA.LST_CABANG_BII.JENIS = #jenis# )
update eka.mst_policy set mspo_plan_provider = #mns_kd_nasabah#, mspo_self_ins=#jn_lead# where reg_spaj = #reg_spaj#
update eka.mst_history_upload set status = #status# where temp_filename = #temp_filename#
update eka.lst_user set luss_online = #luss_online# where lus_id = #lus_id#
update eka.mst_client_new set mspe_email = #value# where mcl_id = (select mcl_id from eka.mst_agent where msag_id = lpad(#key#,6,0))
UPDATE eka.lst_daily_currency SET lkh_currency = #lkh_currency#, lkh_kurs_jual = #lkh_kurs_jual#, lkh_kurs_beli = #lkh_kurs_beli# WHERE lku_id = #lku_id# AND lkh_date = #lkh_date#
update eka.lst_user set lus_password = eka.encrypt(#pass#),lus_change=sysdate where lus_id=#id#

update eka.mst_company set mcl_id = #mcl_id#, lju_id = #lju_id#, mpt_usaha_desc = upper(#mpt_usaha_desc#), mpt_term = #mpt_term#, mpt_npwp = #mpt_npwp#, mpt_contact = upper(#mpt_contact#), lca_id = #lca_id#, lwk_id = #lwk_id#, lsrg_id = #lsrg_id#, lbn_id = #lbn_id#, lsbp_id = #lsbp_id#, tgl_print_inv = to_date(#s_tgl_print_inv#,'dd/mm/yyyy'), tgl_print_kw = to_date(#s_tgl_print_kw#,'dd/mm/yyyy'), flag_ws = #flag_ws#, lus_admin_ws = #lus_admin_ws#, flag_gws = #flag_gws#, flag_group = #flag_group# where mcl_id = #mcl_id#

update eka.mst_company_contact set flag_ut = #flag_ut#, nama_lengkap = upper(#nama_lengkap#), telp_kantor = #telp_kantor#, telp_hp = #telp_hp#, email = upper(#email#), cara_bayar = #cara_bayar#, rek_no = #rek_no#, rek_nama = upper(#rek_nama#), rek_bank = upper(#rek_bank#), rek_bank_cabang = upper(#rek_bank_cabang#), rek_bank_kota = upper(#rek_bank_kota#), lus_id = #lus_id#, input_date = #input_date#, mste_sex = #mste_sex#, jenis_badan = #jenis_badan#, npwp = #npwp#, flag_komisi = #flag_komisi# where mcl_id = #mcl_id# and no_urut = #no_urut#
update eka.mst_client_new set mcl_first=upper(#mcl_first#), mcl_gelar=upper(#mcl_gelar#) where mcl_id=#mcl_id#

UPDATE eka.mst_address_new
alamat_kantor = upper(#alamat_kantor#) alamat_rumah = upper(#alamat_rumah#) area_code_fax = upper(#area_code_fax#) area_code_kantor = upper(#area_code_kantor#) area_code_kantor2 = upper(#area_code_kantor2#) area_code_rumah = upper(#area_code_rumah#) area_code_rumah2 = upper(#area_code_rumah2#) email = upper(#email#) kd_pos_kantor = upper(#kd_pos_kantor#) kd_pos_rumah = upper(#kd_pos_rumah#) kota_kantor = upper(#kota_kantor#) kota_rumah = upper(#kota_rumah#) no_fax = upper(#no_fax#) no_hp = upper(#no_hp#) no_hp2 = upper(#no_hp2#) telpon_kantor = upper(#telpon_kantor#) telpon_kantor2 = upper(#telpon_kantor2#) telpon_rumah = upper(#telpon_rumah#) telpon_rumah2 = upper(#telpon_rumah2#)
WHERE MCL_ID = #mcl_id#

UPDATE eka.mst_tandatangan
mcl_id = upper(#mcl_id#) modify_dt = #modify_dt# modify_id = #modify_id# mstt_ext = upper(#mstt_ext#) mstt_image = #mstt_image# mstt_nama = upper(#mstt_nama#) reg_spaj = upper(#reg_spaj#)
WHERE MSTT_ID = #mstt_id#

update eka.lst_menu_new set link_menu = #link_menu#
,parent_menu_id = #parent_menu_id#
,lst_menu_id = #lst_menu_id#
,nama_menu = #nama_menu#
,flag_aktif = #flag_aktif#
,flag_public = #flag_public#
,tingkat = #tingkat#
,urutan = #urutan#
,jenis_id = #jenis#
,icon = #icon#
where menu_id = #menu_id#

UPDATE EKA.MST_NASABAH SET MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#
,MNS_NAMA = upper(#mns_nama#)
,MNS_SEX = #mns_sex#
,MNS_DCIF = #mns_dcif#
,MNS_TIPE_NASABAH = #mns_tipe_nasabah#
,MNS_AREA_KANTOR = #mns_area_kantor#
,MNS_TLPKANTOR = #mns_tlpkantor#
,MNS_AREA_RUMAH = #mns_area_rumah#
,MNS_TLPRUMAH = #mns_tlprumah#
,MNS_AREA_HP = #mns_area_hp#
,MNS_HP = #mns_hp#
,MNS_TGL_APP = #mns_tgl_app#
,MNS_WAKTU_HUB = #mns_waktu_hub#
,LJL_JENIS = #ljl_jenis#
,MNS_LAYANAN = #mns_layanan#
,MNS_ST_JELAS = #mns_st_jelas#
,MNS_NAMA_LEAD = #mns_nama_lead#
,MSAG_ID = #msag_id#
,KD_ASM = #kd_asm#
,KD_SM = #kd_sm#
,KD_LEADER = #kd_leader#
,KD_RM = #kd_rm#
,MNS_NAMA_FA = #mns_nama_fa#
,KD_REGION = #kd_region#
,KD_KOORD = #kd_koord#
,KD_AREA = #kd_area#
,KD_CABANG = #kd_cabang#
,REFERRER_ID = #referrer_id#
,REFERRER_FA = #referrer_fa#
,KODE = #kode#
,MNS_REFF_CAB = #mns_reff_cab#
,MNS_REK_BII = #mns_rek_bii#
,MNS_USIA = #mns_usia#
,MNS_TT_NASABAH = #mns_tt_nasabah#
,MNS_TGL_TT = #mns_tgl_tt#
,LSBS_ID = #lsbs_id#
,MNS_OK_SARAN = #mns_ok_saran#
,MNS_UP = #mns_up#
,MNS_FREK_REVIEW = #mns_frek_review#
,LSPD_ID = #lspd_id#
,LEADER_REF1 = #leader_ref1#
,LEADER_REF2 = #leader_ref2#
,LEADER_REF3 = #leader_ref3#
,JN_LEAD = #jn_lead#
WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#

UPDATE EKA.MST_DET_NASABAH SET MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#
,REFERRER_ID = #referrer_id#
,LEADER_REF1 = #leader_ref1#
,LEADER_REF2 = #leader_ref2#
,LEADER_REF3 = #leader_ref3#
WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#
UPDATE EKA.LST_ADDR_REGION SET LAR_EMAIL = #LAR_EMAIL# WHERE LAR_ID = #LAR_ID#
UPDATE eka.mst_client_history SET msch_nama_pp = #MSCH_NAMA_PP#, msch_nama_tt = #MSCH_NAMA_TT#, msch_alamat = #MSCH_ALAMAT#, msch_kota = #MSCH_KOTA# WHERE mspo_policy_no = #MSPO_POLICY_NO#

UPDATE eka.mst_client_history SET msch_tgl_terima = #msch_tgl_terima#, msch_tgl_kirim = #msch_tgl_kirim# WHERE msch_status_input = #msch_status_input# AND lus_id = #lus_id# AND mspo_policy_no = RPAD (REPLACE (#mspo_policy_no#, '.'), 14, ' ')
UPDATE eka.m_reas_temp_new SET flag_ins=#value# WHERE flag_ins=1
UPDATE EKA.MST_NASABAH SET LSBS_ID = #lsbs_id# WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#
UPDATE eka.mst_nasabah SET lspd_id = #lspd_id# WHERE mns_kd_nasabah = #mns_kd_nasabah#

UPDATE EKA.MST_RELASI_NASABAH SET mrn_nama = upper(#mrn_nama#), mrn_alamat = upper(#mrn_alamat#), mrn_contact_no = #mrn_contact_no#, mrn_ket_relasi = upper(#mrn_ket_relasi#), mrn_alasan = upper(#mrn_alasan#), mrn_ref_to_bii = #mrn_ref_to_bii#, referrer_id = #referrer_id# WHERE mns_kd_nasabah = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND mrn_no_relasi = #mrn_no_relasi#

UPDATE EKA.MST_CHILDREN SET mch_jn_relasi = #mch_jn_relasi#, mch_nama = upper(#mch_nama#), mch_birth_date = #mch_birth_date#, mch_usia = #mch_usia#, mch_pekerjaan = upper(#mch_pekerjaan#), mch_renc_studi = upper(#mch_renc_studi#), mch_tempat_studi = upper(#mch_tempat_studi#), mch_waktu_realisasi = upper(#mch_waktu_realisasi#), mch_biaya = #mch_biaya#, mch_renc_skrg = upper(#mch_renc_skrg#), mch_pengaturan = upper(#mch_pengaturan#) WHERE mns_kd_nasabah = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND mch_id = #mch_id#

UPDATE EKA.MST_MATRIX_ADV SET MSMA_STUDI_C = #msma_studi_c#, MSMA_STUDI_B = #msma_studi_b#, MSMA_STUDI_A = #msma_studi_a#, MSMA_PENSIUN_C = #msma_pensiun_c#, MSMA_PENSIUN_B = #msma_pensiun_b#, MSMA_PENSIUN_A = #msma_pensiun_a#, MSMA_PROTEKSI_C = #msma_proteksi_c#, MSMA_PROTEKSI_B = #msma_proteksi_b#, MSMA_PROTEKSI_A = #msma_proteksi_a#, MSMA_SAVING_C = #msma_saving_c#, MSMA_SAVING_B = #msma_saving_b#, MSMA_SAVING_A = #msma_saving_a# WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND LSBS_ID = #lsbs_id# AND MSMA_FUND = #msma_fund#
UPDATE EKA.MST_REKOMENDASI SET LSBS_ID = #lsbs_id#, MSREK_ALASAN = upper(#msrek_alasan#) WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND MSREK_NO = #msrek_no#
UPDATE EKA.MST_ASPIRASI SET MSAS_ASPIRASI = upper(#msas_aspirasi#) WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND MSAS_NO = #msas_no#

UPDATE EKA.MST_JIFFY SET mjf_perusahaan = upper(#mjf_perusahaan#), mjf_lama_kerja = #mjf_lama_kerja#, mjf_lama_kerja_bln = #mjf_lama_kerja_bln#, mjf_jn_pekerjaan = upper(#mjf_jn_pekerjaan#), mjf_alamat_ktr = upper(#mjf_alamat_ktr#), mjf_kota = upper(#mjf_kota#), mjf_kd_pos_ktr = #mjf_kd_pos_ktr#, mjf_renc_karir = #mjf_renc_karir#, mjf_ket_renc_karir = upper(#mjf_ket_renc_karir#), mjf_renc_realisasi = upper(#mjf_renc_realisasi#), mjf_ket_pekerjaan = upper(#mjf_ket_pekerjaan#), mjf_hobby = upper(#mjf_hobby#), mjf_alasan_hobby = upper(#mjf_alasan_hobby#), mjf_frek_hobby = upper(#mjf_frek_hobby#), mjf_partner_hobby = #mjf_partner_hobby#, mjf_ket_partner = upper(#mjf_ket_partner#), mjf_ket_hobby = upper(#mjf_ket_hobby#), mjf_menikah_yt = #mjf_menikah_yt#, mjf_menikah_ket = upper(#mjf_menikah_ket#), mjf_anak_yt = #mjf_anak_yt#, mjf_anak_ket = upper(#mjf_anak_ket#), mjf_cucu_yt = #mjf_cucu_yt#, mjf_cucu_ket = upper(#mjf_cucu_ket#), mjf_ket_family = upper(#mjf_ket_family#), mjf_frek_ktm_teman = upper(#mjf_frek_ktm_teman#), mjf_ingin_sering_yt = #mjf_ingin_sering_yt#, mjf_ingin_sering_ket = upper(#mjf_ingin_sering_ket#), mjf_real_pensiun_yt = #mjf_real_pensiun_yt#, mjf_real_pensiun_ket = upper(#mjf_real_pensiun_ket#), mjf_ket_friend = upper(#mjf_ket_friend#), mjf_besar_biaya = #mjf_besar_biaya#, mjf_kebutuhan = #mjf_kebutuhan#, mjf_biaya_pendidikan = #mjf_biaya_pendidikan#, mjf_biaya_pensiun = #mjf_biaya_pensiun#, mjf_biaya_pleasure = #mjf_biaya_pleasure#, mjf_ket_you = upper(#mjf_ket_you#), mjf_sikap_resiko = #mjf_sikap_resiko#, mjf_budget = #mjf_budget# WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#

UPDATE EKA.MST_RELASI_NASABAH SET EKA.MST_RELASI_NASABAH.MRN_NO_RELASI = #mrn_no_relasiafter# WHERE EKA.MST_RELASI_NASABAH.MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND EKA.MST_RELASI_NASABAH.MRN_NO_RELASI = #mrn_no_relasibefore#
UPDATE EKA.MST_PROD_BANK SET EKA.MST_PROD_BANK.MPB_NO = #mpb_noafter# WHERE EKA.MST_PROD_BANK.MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND EKA.MST_PROD_BANK.MPB_NO = #mpb_nobefore#
UPDATE EKA.MST_CHILDREN SET EKA.MST_CHILDREN.MCH_ID = #mch_idafter# WHERE EKA.MST_CHILDREN.MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND EKA.MST_CHILDREN.MCH_ID = #mch_idbefore#
UPDATE EKA.MST_AKTIVITAS SET TGL_TRANSFER = SYSDATE WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND KD_AKTIVITAS = #kd_aktivitas#

UPDATE eka.mst_aktivitas
approval = #approval# kd_aktivitas = #kd_aktivitas# keterangan = upper(#keterangan#) mns_kd_nasabah = upper(#mns_kd_nasabah#) pert_ke = #pert_ke# status = #status# tgl_pert = #tgl_pert# tgl_transfer = #tgl_transfer#
WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND PERT_KE = #pert_ke# AND KD_AKTIVITAS = #kd_aktivitas#

UPDATE EKA.MST_KEBUTUHAN SET LJK_ID = #ljk_id#, MKB_RANK = #mkb_rank#, MKB_ALASAN = upper(#mkb_alasan#), MKB_JML_BUTUH = #mkb_jml_butuh#, MKB_PDPT_BUTUH = #mkb_pdpt_butuh#, MKB_WKT_BUTUH_TH = #mkb_wkt_butuh_th#, MKB_WKT_BUTUH_BL = #mkb_wkt_butuh_bl#, MKB_JML_DPOLEH = #mkb_jml_dpoleh#, MKB_PDPT_DPOLEH = #mkb_pdpt_dpoleh#, MKB_WKT_DPOLEH_TH = #mkb_wkt_dpoleh_th#, MKB_WKT_DPOLEH_BL = #mkb_wkt_dpoleh_bl#, MKB_PENTING = #mkb_penting# WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND MKB_NO = #mkb_no#

UPDATE eka.mst_pendapatan SET LSP_ID = #lsp_id#, LSP_IN_OUT = #lsp_in_out#, MNS_KD_NASABAH = upper(#mns_kd_nasabah#), MPP_VALUE = #mpp_value#, MPP_VALUE_ALASAN = upper(#mpp_value_alasan#) WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND LSP_ID = #lsp_id#

UPDATE EKA.MST_SURPLUS_CALC SET JUMLAH_BUTUH = #jumlah_butuh#, JUMLAH_TERSEDIA = #jumlah_tersedia#, PCT_INVEST = #pct_invest#, RATE_INFLASI = #rate_inflasi#, TAHUN_BUTUH = #tahun_butuh#, TAMBAHAN = #tambahan# WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#

UPDATE EKA.MST_PROTECT_CALC SET ADD_CAPITAL1 = #add_capital1#, ADD_CAPITAL2 = #add_capital2#, BENEFIT_INSURANCE1 = #benefit_insurance1#, BENEFIT_INSURANCE2 = #benefit_insurance2#, BENEFIT_PENSIUN1 = #benefit_pensiun1#, BENEFIT_PENSIUN2 = #benefit_pensiun2#, CAPITAL_LUMP_SUMS1 = #capital_lump_sums1#, CAPITAL_LUMP_SUMS2 = #capital_lump_sums2#, CAPITAL_SAVING1 = #capital_saving1#, CAPITAL_SAVING2 = #capital_saving2#, INC_CHILD_COST1 = #inc_child_cost1#, INC_CHILD_COST2 = #inc_child_cost2#, MEDICAL_EXPENSE1 = #medical_expense1#, MEDICAL_EXPENSE2 = #medical_expense2#, NAMA1 = upper(#nama1#), NAMA2 = upper(#nama2#), OTHER_INCOME1 = #other_income1#, OTHER_INCOME2 = #other_income2#, PCT_INTEREST1 = #pct_interest1#, PCT_INTEREST2 = #pct_interest2#, REDUCTION_CREDIT1 = #reduction_credit1#, REDUCTION_CREDIT2 = #reduction_credit2#, REDUCTION_KPR1 = #reduction_kpr1#, REDUCTION_KPR2 = #reduction_kpr2#, REDUCTION_PERSONAL1 = #reduction_personal1#, REDUCTION_PERSONAL2 = #reduction_personal2#, REDUCTION_PREMI1 = #reduction_premi1#, REDUCTION_PREMI2 = #reduction_premi2#, REDUCTION_SAVING1 = #reduction_saving1#, REDUCTION_SAVING2 = #reduction_saving2#, YEARLY_INCOME1 = #yearly_income1#, YEARLY_INCOME2 = #yearly_income2# WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#

UPDATE EKA.MST_INCOME_CALC SET ANNUAL_INCOME = #annual_income#, CAPITAL = #capital#, PCT_INTEREST1 = #pct_interest1#, PCT_INTEREST2 = #pct_interest2#, PERIOD_YEAR = #period_year# WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah#

UPDATE eka.mst_prod_bank
lpb_id = #lpb_id# mns_kd_nasabah = upper(#mns_kd_nasabah#) mpb_jml_tabungan = #mpb_jml_tabungan# mpb_ket_nm_bank = upper(#mpb_ket_nm_bank#) mpb_nm_bank = upper(#mpb_nm_bank#) mpb_nm_tabungan = upper(#mpb_nm_tabungan#) mpb_no = #mpb_no# mpb_note = upper(#mpb_note#) mpb_status = #mpb_status# mpb_tabungan = #mpb_tabungan#
WHERE MNS_KD_NASABAH = #mns_kd_nasabah# AND LPB_ID = #lpb_id# AND MPB_NO = #mpb_no#
UPDATE EKA.LST_HRD_SURAT_OTORISASI SET REGIONAL_FLAG = #regional_flag#, AKM_FLAG = #akm_flag# WHERE SURAT_ID = #surat_id#
update hrd.hrd_surat@absen set is_agency = #is_agency# where surat_id = #surat_id#
update eka.mst_agent_absen set jam_keluar = sysdate where msag_id = #msag_id# and tanggal = trunc(sysdate)

update eka.mst_kuesioner_brand set lus_id=#lus_id#, mkb_cr_msig_1=#mkb_cr_msig_1#, mkb_cr_msig_2=#mkb_cr_msig_2#, mkb_cr_msig_3=#mkb_cr_msig_3#, mkb_cr_msig_4=#mkb_cr_msig_4#, mkb_cr_msig_5=#mkb_cr_msig_5#, mkb_cr_aset_1=#mkb_cr_aset_1#, mkb_cr_aset_2=#mkb_cr_aset_2#, mkb_cr_aset_3=#mkb_cr_aset_3#, mkb_cr_aset_4=#mkb_cr_aset_4#, mkb_cr_aset_5=#mkb_cr_aset_5#, mkb_cr_pelanggan_1=#mkb_cr_pelanggan_1#, mkb_cr_pelanggan_2=#mkb_cr_pelanggan_2#, mkb_cr_pelanggan_3=#mkb_cr_pelanggan_3#, mkb_cr_pelanggan_4=#mkb_cr_pelanggan_4#, mkb_cr_pelanggan_5=#mkb_cr_pelanggan_5#, mkb_cr_prima_1=#mkb_cr_prima_1#, mkb_cr_prima_2=#mkb_cr_prima_2#, mkb_cr_prima_3=#mkb_cr_prima_3#, mkb_cr_prima_4=#mkb_cr_prima_4#, mkb_cr_prima_5=#mkb_cr_prima_5#, mkb_pr_terbaik_1=#mkb_pr_terbaik_1#, mkb_pr_terbaik_2=#mkb_pr_terbaik_2#, mkb_pr_terbaik_3=#mkb_pr_terbaik_3#, mkb_pr_terbaik_4=#mkb_pr_terbaik_4#, mkb_pr_terbaik_5=#mkb_pr_terbaik_5#, mkb_pr_fleksibilias_1=#mkb_pr_fleksibilias_1#, mkb_pr_fleksibilias_2=#mkb_pr_fleksibilias_2#, mkb_pr_fleksibilias_3=#mkb_pr_fleksibilias_3#, mkb_pr_fleksibilias_4=#mkb_pr_fleksibilias_4#, mkb_pr_fleksibilias_5=#mkb_pr_fleksibilias_5#, mkb_pr_asuransi_1=#mkb_pr_asuransi_1#, mkb_pr_asuransi_2=#mkb_pr_asuransi_2#, mkb_pr_asuransi_3=#mkb_pr_asuransi_3#, mkb_pr_asuransi_4=#mkb_pr_asuransi_4#, mkb_pr_asuransi_5=#mkb_pr_asuransi_5#, mkb_pr_produk_1=#mkb_pr_produk_1#, mkb_pr_produk_2=#mkb_pr_produk_2#, mkb_pr_produk_3=#mkb_pr_produk_3#, mkb_pr_produk_4=#mkb_pr_produk_4#, mkb_pr_produk_5=#mkb_pr_produk_5#, mkb_im_internasional_1=#mkb_im_internasional_1#, mkb_im_internasional_2=#mkb_im_internasional_2#, mkb_im_internasional_3=#mkb_im_internasional_3#, mkb_im_internasional_4=#mkb_im_internasional_4#, mkb_im_internasional_5=#mkb_im_internasional_5#, mkb_im_positif_1=#mkb_im_positif_1#, mkb_im_positif_2=#mkb_im_positif_2#, mkb_im_positif_3=#mkb_im_positif_3#, mkb_im_positif_4=#mkb_im_positif_4#, mkb_im_positif_5=#mkb_im_positif_5#, mkb_im_moderen_1=#mkb_im_moderen_1#, mkb_im_moderen_2=#mkb_im_moderen_2#, mkb_im_moderen_3=#mkb_im_moderen_3#, mkb_im_moderen_4=#mkb_im_moderen_4#, mkb_im_moderen_5=#mkb_im_moderen_5#, mkb_im_komitmen_1=#mkb_im_komitmen_1#, mkb_im_komitmen_2=#mkb_im_komitmen_2#, mkb_im_komitmen_3=#mkb_im_komitmen_3#, mkb_im_komitmen_4=#mkb_im_komitmen_4#, mkb_im_komitmen_5=#mkb_im_komitmen_5#, mkb_em_waspada_1=#mkb_em_waspada_1#, mkb_em_waspada_2=#mkb_em_waspada_2#, mkb_em_waspada_3=#mkb_em_waspada_3#, mkb_em_waspada_4=#mkb_em_waspada_4#, mkb_em_waspada_5=#mkb_em_waspada_5#, mkb_em_kenyamanan_1=#mkb_em_kenyamanan_1#, mkb_em_kenyamanan_2=#mkb_em_kenyamanan_2#, mkb_em_kenyamanan_3=#mkb_em_kenyamanan_3#, mkb_em_kenyamanan_4=#mkb_em_kenyamanan_4#, mkb_em_kenyamanan_5=#mkb_em_kenyamanan_5#, mkb_em_pengertian_1=#mkb_em_pengertian_1#, mkb_em_pengertian_2=#mkb_em_pengertian_2#, mkb_em_pengertian_3=#mkb_em_pengertian_3#, mkb_em_pengertian_4=#mkb_em_pengertian_4#, mkb_em_pengertian_5=#mkb_em_pengertian_5#, mkb_em_ketulusan_1=#mkb_em_ketulusan_1#, mkb_em_ketulusan_2=#mkb_em_ketulusan_2#, mkb_em_ketulusan_3=#mkb_em_ketulusan_3#, mkb_em_ketulusan_4=#mkb_em_ketulusan_4#, mkb_em_ketulusan_5=#mkb_em_ketulusan_5#, mkb_input_date=#mkb_input_date# where lus_id = #lus_id#
update eka.lst_user set lus_change = sysdate , lus_nik=#nik# where lus_id= #lus_id#

UPDATE eka.mst_voucher_taxi@eb
msvt_msag_id = #msvt_msag_id# msvt_user_dept = upper(#msvt_user_dept#) msvt_from = upper(#msvt_from#) msvt_to = upper(#msvt_to#) msvt_cost = #msvt_cost# msvt_release_date = #msvt_release_date# msvt_return_date = #msvt_return_date# lus_id = #lus_id# msvt_insert_date = #msvt_insert_date# lus_id_edit = #lus_id_edit# msvt_edit_date = #msvt_edit_date# msvt_status_flag = #msvt_status_flag# msvt_status_desc = #msvt_status_desc#
WHERE msvt_no = #msvt_no#

update.isEqual: update eka.mst_policy set mspo_no_blanko=#s_update# where mspo_policy_no=#nopol#
update eka.mst_policy set mspo_nasabah_dcif=#s_update# where mspo_policy_no=#nopol#
update eka.mst_policy set mspo_no_pengiriman=#s_update# where mspo_policy_no=#nopol#

sqlMap.update: update eka.mst_policy set lspd_id = 99 where lspd_id = 6 and mspo_policy_no = #polis#

update eka.mst_jne_pod set mspo_no_pengiriman = #s_connote#, mstj_tujuan = #s_dest#, mstj_consignee = #s_consignee#, mstj_receiver = #s_penerima# , mstj_tgl_terima = to_date(#d_tglTerima#,'dd/MM/yyyy'), lus_id = #lus_id#, mstj_tgl_upload =sysdate where reg_spaj =RPAD (REPLACE (#spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ')
update eka.mst_worksite_flag set nik = #nik# where reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ')
